https://redux-toolkit.js.org/rtk-query/o.info: Comprehensive RTK Query overview including data fetching, caching, bundle size (~9kb for RTK Query), and integration patterns with createApi() and fetchBaseQuery()

https://redux-toolkit.js.org/rtk-query/u.title: Cache Behavior - RTK Query
https://redux-toolkit.js.org/rtk-query/u.info: RTK Query caching mechanisms including default 60-second cache lifetime, configurable cache settings, refetching strategies, and automated cache management for performance optimization

https://redux.js.org/tutorials/essential.title: Redux Essentials, Part 6: Performance, Normalizing Data, and Reactive Logic
https://redux.js.org/tutorials/essential.info: Performance optimization techniques including createEntityAdapter for normalized data, createSelector for memoization, and createListenerMiddleware for reactive logic in large-scale applications

https://redux.js.org/usage/usage-with-ty.title: Usage With TypeScript - Redux
https://redux.js.org/usage/usage-with-ty.info: TypeScript integration patterns for Redux including type safety benefits, store setup, slice definitions, component usage, and middleware typing for improved developer experience

https://medium.com/@donald.walters/supab.info: RTK Query integration patterns with Supabase including TypeScript setup, custom baseQuery implementation, type generation, and best practices for reducing boilerplate code

https://medium.com/@sandhyasrinivasan.15.info: Performance comparison showing Context API suitable for smaller applications while Redux Toolkit excels in large-scale applications with complex state management, predictable transitions, and middleware support

https://redux.js.org/faq/performance.title: Performance | Redux

https://manishgcodes.medium.com/master-c.info: React Query caching strategies including queryKey patterns, gcTime, staleTime configuration, and user data caching approaches
